name: Droid Muncher
overview: It is a landscape of danger, never before infiltrated successfully. It is a world of monsters and creatures unknown, deadly beings who know no peace, and thrive on destruction and chaos. It is the world of droids, in which you must navigate your robot in a search for the creatures and wipe them out while avoiding the other attackers. Droid Muncher, a game of another world. DROID MUNCHER - can you survive it? Maneuver your robot through the hazard filled woods in search of deadly droids and blast them to smithereens. Avoid poisonous green plants and deadly rodents.
